title: Forgotten efi password from iMac 2012
message:
Hi,
Customer has forgotten efi password, so I am trying to reset it. I have the refi chip removed from the board and had it in my high speed programmer, but where do I get a clean .bin file from to load onto it?
Thanks
Also the info from the chip reads:
adesto1637 45db021e
The programmer software I a using does not have that manufacturer, so how can. get the programmer to work with the chip?
TIA

title: Forgotten efi password from iMac 2012
message: Upload somewhere original dump.

title: Forgotten efi password from iMac 2012
message: I can't get the software to detect the chip so I cannot get anything from it. Using the drop down links on the left hand side of the software, there is not manufacturer called adesto. Programmer I am using is EZP2013.

title: Forgotten efi password from iMac 2012
message: Take the specs from Internet and manually choose an equivalent chip from software menu...

title: Forgotten efi password from iMac 2012

title: Forgotten efi password from iMac 2012
message: SPI chip should be 8MB WSON8, located on the opossite side of PCH; W25Q64 maybe.

title: Forgotten efi password from iMac 2012
message: That what I took off is the only chip on the board that looks like a bios chip. I have bought one so will eat for that to see what it looks like.
